specials.name: Is it Safe?
specials.description:
A creature bitten by a tooth fairy must make a DC 13 Fortitude save.
Success: creature is unaffected
Failure: creature is paralyzed for 1 round
Critical Failure: creature is paralyzed for 1 minute.

specials.name: Pliers Connection
specials.description: A tooth fairy is closely tied to a pair of Medium pliers that it can wield in 2 hands and has learned to accommodate such massive tools while in flight. The pliers have hardness 3 and 5 hit points (2 BT). If a Tooth Fairy is not holding its pliers it becomes Clumsy 1. If a tooth fairy’s pliers are destroyed, it immediately becomes stunned 3 for 1 round and stunned 2 following until its pliers are replaced. Replacing a set of destroyed pliers requires 1 day of downtime to make a magical connection to a new set of pliers.

specials.name: Pull Tooth
specials.description:
A tooth fairy rushes in for that most tasty of prizes!  The tooth fairy makes an athletics check against the target's fortitude DC.
Critical Success: The tooth fairy painfully rips out two teeth. The target takes 2 persistent bleed and takes a -2 circumstance penalty to Diplomacy and Intimidate, and Deception checks to Lie, for 24 hours or until they are targeted by Treat Wounds and the teeth are reinserted.
Success: as a critical success except the tooth fairy only pulls out one tooth, reducing the persistent damage to 1 and the circumstance penalty to -1.
Critical Failure: The fairy loses its grip on its pliers and accidentally Releases them.

specials.name: Pinch Finger
specials.description:
The tooth fairy cries, "Those are my teeth!".  It attempts to crush one of the target's fingers with it's pliers. The tooth fairy makes an Athletics check against the target’s Reflex DC.
Critical Success: The target is Clumsy 1 for 1 minute.
Success: The target is Clumsy 1 for 1 round.
Critical Failure: The fairy loses its grip on its pliers and accidentally Releases them.

specials.name: Glittery Death
specials.description:
When killed, a tooth fairy explodes into a cloud of sparkling white fairy dust that clings to creatures within 5 feet. This glittery substance has a stench so foul that creatures must attempt a DC 14 Fortitude save.
Success: creature is unaffected
Failure: creature is sickened 1
Critical failure: creature is sickened 2
